attributes.action: take an oath to tell nothing but the truth at the start of every Prime Minister's Question Time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should put an end to any more speculation that our leaders are nothing but 100% honest with the electorate or may occasionally provide us with information that they are not too sure about themselves. By swearing in, in the presence of a legal witness as well as the entire nation, we would be left reassured that the whole truth, and nothing but the truth would emerge from our Prime Minister's lips (especially a devoutly religious one)
